com.softwareag.wx.is.config
Class WxConfig

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,PkgConfig>
          com.softwareag.wx.is.config.WxConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,PkgConfig>
public class WxConfig
extends java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,PkgConfig>

This is the main class of the WxConfig package. It maintains a Hashtable that holds one configuration object per IS package. The key to the config objects is the IS package name (case-sensitive!)

It is implemented as a singleton and therefore all access needs to happen via WxConfig.getInstance().myMethod()

It operates like this

  • Load file ./packages/WxConfig/config/wxconfig.cnf
  • If include files are defined there, also load them (at the moment includes can only be defined in wxconfig.cnf but in the included files themselves; reason: circular dependencies would need to be detected which is somewhat complex)
  • Loop over all active packages and do exactly the same as for WxConfig

The methods from Access must NOT be used in here, because they assume that the initialization is completed. So they would (not always!) cause a java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError

See Also:

allConfigFiles

public ConfigFileList allConfigFiles()
Return list of all known config files. The value from "showWxConfigFiles" (shall files of packages that belong to the WxConfig family be included in result) is taken into account.

Returns:
List with all recognized config files of the entire IS

getAllValues

public java.lang.String[] getAllValues()
Returns:
String array with content of all config files in the format key=value. If XML files are used, the order may differ from the file.
